steps.title: Close Editing
steps.content: This section allows you to edit your department, for that you must first click any of the department from previous section

steps.title: Posts Management
steps.content: All basic departments are already provided like company, Hr, accounts etc.. You just need to create your production phases. Production phases will also be considered as department. But its ok if you do not treat them as departments. just create them here.
